search.query: | inputlookup $lookup$_all_saved_searches_src.csv | eval src = "true" | rename eai:acl.app as src_APP, eai:acl.owner as src_OWNER, eai:acl.sharing as src_SHARING, search as src_search |search src_SHARING$user$ | append [| rest splunk_server=local /servicesNS/-/-/saved/searches | fields eai:acl.app title eai:acl.owner eai:acl.sharing disabled search | rename eai:acl.app as dest_APP, eai:acl.owner as dest_OWNER, eai:acl.sharing as dest_SHARING, search as dest_search |search dest_SHARING$user$ | eval dest="true"] | stats values(*) as * by title | eval src = if(isnull(src), "false", src), dest = if(isnull(dest), "false", dest) |search src_APP IN ($include$)

| inputlookup $lookup$_all_dashboards.csv |rex field=updated "^(?<year>\d{4})\-(?<month>\d{2})\-(?<day>\d+)T" | eval src = "true" , time=$TIME$ |rex field=time "(?<mon>\d{1,2})\/(?<d>\d{1,2})\/(?<y>\d+)" | rename eai:acl.app as src_APP, eai:acl.sharing as src_SHARING, disabled as src_disabled, label as src_label, eai:acl.owner as src_owner, eai:data as src_data |search src_SHARING$user$ | append [| rest splunk_server=local /servicesNS/-/-/data/ui/views | fields eai:acl.sharing, eai:acl.app, disabled, label, title, eai:acl.owner, eai:data | rename eai:acl.app as dest_APP, eai:acl.sharing as dest_SHARING, disabled as dest_disabled, label as dest_label, eai:acl.owner as dest_owne, eai:data as dest_data |search dest_SHARING$user$ | eval dest="true" ] | stats values(*) as * by title | eval src = if(isnull(src), "false", src), dest = if(isnull(dest), "false", dest) |search src_APP IN ($include$)

| inputlookup $lookup$_all_field_extraction_src.csv | eval src = "true" | rename eai:acl.app as src_APP, eai:acl.owner as src_OWNER, eai:acl.sharing as src_SHARING, attribute as src_attribute, author as src_author , value as src_value |search src_SHARING$user$ | append [| rest splunk_server=local /servicesNS/-/-/data/props/extractions | fields title eai:acl.app, eai:acl.owner,eai:acl.sharing author attribute value | rename eai:acl.app as dest_APP, eai:acl.owner as dest_OWNER, eai:acl.sharing as dest_SHARING, attribute as dest_attribute, author as dest_author, value as dest_value |search dest_SHARING$user$ | eval dest="true"] | stats values(*) as * by title | eval src = if(isnull(src), "false", src), dest = if(isnull(dest), "false", dest) |fields - value |search src_APP IN ($include$)

| inputlookup $lookup$_all_eventtypes_src.csv | eval src = "true" | rename eai:acl.app as src_APP, eai:acl.owner as src_OWNER, eai:acl.sharing as src_SHARING, tags as src_TAGS |search src_SHARING$user$ | append [| rest splunk_server=local servicesNS/-/-/saved/eventtypes | fields eai:acl.app,eai:acl.owner,eai:acl.sharing,search,tags,title | rename eai:acl.app as dest_APP, eai:acl.owner as dest_OWNER, eai:acl.sharing as dest_SHARING, tags as dest_TAGS |search dest_SHARING$user$ | eval dest="true"] | stats values(*) as * by title | fields - search | eval src = if(isnull(src), "false", src), dest = if(isnull(dest), "false", dest) | search src_APP IN ($include$)

| inputlookup $lookup$_all_lookup_src.csv | eval src = "true" | rename eai:acl.app as src_APP, eai:acl.owner as src_OWNER, eai:acl.sharing as src_SHARING |search src_SHARING$user$ | append [| rest splunk_Server=local /servicesNS/-/-/data/lookup-table-files | fields title eai:acl.app, eai:acl.owner,eai:acl.sharing | rename eai:acl.app as dest_APP, eai:acl.owner as dest_OWNER, eai:acl.sharing as dest_SHARING |search dest_SHARING$user$ | eval dest="true"] | stats values(*) as * by title | eval src = if(isnull(src), "false", src), dest = if(isnull(dest), "false", dest) | search dest=$missing$ src="true" src_APP IN ($include$)

| inputlookup $lookup$_all_datamodel_src.csv | eval src = "true" | rename eai:acl.app as src_APP, eai:acl.owner as src_OWNER, eai:acl.sharing as src_SHARING, displayName as src_displayName |search src_SHARING$user$ | append [| rest splunk_server=local /servicesNS/-/-/datamodel/model | fields title eai:acl.app, eai:acl.owner,eai:acl.sharing | rename eai:acl.app as src_APP, eai:acl.owner as src_OWNER, eai:acl.sharing as src_SHARING, displayName as src_displayName |search dest_SHARING$user$ | eval dest="true"] | stats values(*) as * by title | eval src = if(isnull(src), "false", src), dest = if(isnull(dest), "false", dest) | search dest=$missing$ src="true" src_APP IN ($include$)

| inputlookup $lookup$_all_users_src.csv | eval src = "true" | eval title=lower(title) | rename email as src_email, realname as src_realname, type as src_type | append [| rest splunk_server=local /servicesNS/-/-/authentication/users | fields email realname title type | rename email as dest_email, realname as dest_realname, type as dest_type | eval dest="true"] | stats values(*) as * by title | eval src = if(isnull(src), "false", src), dest = if(isnull(dest), "false", dest) | search dest=$missing$ src="true"

| inputlookup $lookup$_all_macros_src.csv | eval src = "true" | rename eai:acl.app as src_APP, definition as src_definition, args as src_args, disabled as src_disabled, eai:acl.owner as src_owner, eai:acl.sharing as src_SHARING |search src_SHARING$user$ | append [| rest splunk_server=local /servicesNS/-/-/configs/conf-macros | fields title eai:acl.app definition args disabled eai:acl.owner eai:acl.sharing definition as dest_definition |rename eai:acl.app as dest_app, definition as dest_definition, args as dest_args, disabled as dest_disabled, eai:acl.owner as dest_owner,eai:acl.sharing as dest_SHARING |search dest_SHARING$user$ | eval dest="true"] | stats values(*) as * by title | eval src = if(isnull(src), "false", src), dest = if(isnull(dest), "false", dest) | search src_APP IN ($include$)
|rest splunk_server=local services/server/info |fields serverName | rex field=serverName ".*?\.(?<stack>.*?)\." |fields stack
|search dest=$missing$ src="true" | fields - *_search | fields src_APP |dedup src_APP
|search dest=$missing$ src="true" | fields - *_search | fields src_APP |mvexpand src_APP |dedup src_APP |sort src_APP

table.title: Click anywhere and check the saved searches' content comparison

search.query: | search dest=$missing$ src="true" | fields - *_search | search src_APP=$app_savedsearch$ NOT src_APP IN ($exclude_savedsearch$)| sort src_APP
| search dest="true" src="true" | fields - *_search | fields src_APP |mvexpand src_APP |dedup src_APP |sort src_APP

table.title: Only Knowledge objects on both stacks

search.query: | search dest="true" src="true" | fields title, *_APP, *_search | eval equal = if(src_search==dest_search,1,0) | search equal=$equal$ NOT src_APP IN ($exclude_savedsearch_comparison$)
| search dest=$missing$ src="true" | fields src_APP |dedup src_APP
| search dest=$missing$ src="true" | fields src_APP |mvexpand src_APP |dedup src_APP |sort src_APP

table.title: Click anywhere and check the dashboards' content comparison

search.query: |fields - *_data | search dest=$missing$ src="true" src_APP=$app_dashboard$ NOT src_APP IN ($exclude_dashboard$)| sort src_APP
| search dest="true" src="true" | where year=y AND month>=mon AND day>=d |fields - *_data | fields src_APP |mvexpand src_APP |dedup src_APP |sort src_APP

table.title: Only Knowledge objects on both stacks

search.query: | search dest="true" src="true" NOT src_APP IN ($exclude_dashboard_comparison$) | where year=y AND month>=mon AND day>=d |table title, *_APP, *_SHARING, *_data, *_label,*_owner,*_updated
| search dest=$missing$ src="true"| sort src_APP |dedup src_APP
| search dest=$missing$ src="true"| fields src_APP |mvexpand src_APP |dedup src_APP |sort src_APP

table.title: Click anywhere and check the Field extractions' value comparison

search.query: | search dest=$missing$ src="true"| search src_APP=$app_field$ NOT src_APP IN ($exclude_field_extractions$) | sort src_APP
| search dest=true src="true" | fields src_APP |mvexpand src_APP |dedup src_APP |sort src_APP

table.title: Only Knowledge objects on both stacks

search.query: | search dest=true src="true" | fields title, *_APP, *_value | eval equal = if(src_value==dest_value,1,0) | search equal=$equal$ NOT src_APP IN ($exclude_field_extractions_comparison$) | sort src_APP
| search dest=$missing$ src="true"| fields src_APP |dedup src_APP
| search dest=$missing$ src="true"| fields src_APP |mvexpand src_APP |dedup src_APP |sort src_APP

table.title: Click anywhere and check the Eventtypes' value comparison

search.query: | search dest=$missing$ src="true"| search src_APP=$app_eventtype$ NOT src_APP IN ($exclude_eventtype$)| sort src_APP
| search src=true dest=true | fields src_APP |mvexpand src_APP |dedup src_APP |sort src_APP

table.title: Only Knowledge objects on both stacks

search.query: | search src=true dest=true | sort src_APP | fields title, *_APP, *_SEARCH | eval equal = if(src_SEARCH==dest_SEARCH,1,0) | search equal=$equal$ NOT src_APP IN ($exclude_eventtype_comparison$)

| inputlookup $lookup$_all_tags.csv | eval src = "true" | append [| rest splunk_server=local /servicesNS/-/-/search/tags | fields title | eval dest="true" ] | stats values(*) as * by title | eval src = if(isnull(src), "false", src), dest = if(isnull(dest), "false", dest) | search dest=$missing$ src="true" | sort title
| fields src_APP |dedup src_APP
| fields src_APP |mvexpand src_APP |dedup src_APP |sort src_APP
| search src_APP=$app_lookup$ NOT src_APP IN ($exclude_lookup$)| sort src_APP
| fields src_APP |dedup src_APP
| fields src_APP |mvexpand src_APP |dedup src_APP |sort src_APP
|search src_APP=$app_datamodel$ NOT src_APP IN ($exclude_datamodel$)| sort src_APP
| search dest=$missing$ src="true"| fields src_APP |dedup src_APP
| search dest=$missing$ src="true"| fields src_APP |mvexpand src_APP |dedup src_APP |sort src_APP
| search dest=$missing$ src="true"|search src_APP=$app_macros$ NOT src_APP IN ($exclude_macros$) | sort src_APP
| search dest=true src="true" | fields src_APP |mvexpand src_APP |dedup src_APP |sort src_APP

table.title: Only Knowledge objects on both stacks

search.query: | search dest=true src="true" |fields title, *_definition, *_args, *_APP, *_owner, *_sharing | eval equal = if(src_definition==dest_definition,1,0) | search equal=$equal$ NOT src_APP IN ($exclude_macros_comparison$) | sort src_APP
| sort title

| inputlookup $lookup$_all_apps_src.csv | eval src = "true" | append [| rest splunk_server=local /servicesNS/-/-/apps/local | fields label title | eval dest="true"] | stats values(*) as * by title | eval src = if(isnull(src), "false", src), dest = if(isnull(dest), "false", dest) | search dest=$missing$ src="true"
